code:
Here is a simple example of how to generate a cross-site scripting (XSS) payload for cookie theft:

1. Log in to your website's administration panel. You can usually access it using the URL of your web page (e.g., https://example.com).

2. Select the "Security" section in the administration panel.

3. Click on the "Cookie Theft Protection" subsection. This may be found by browsing to the "Security" section and looking for the subsection under the "Cookies" heading.

4. This will bring up a page where you can enable cookie theft protection. Enter a name for your cookie, choose an expiration time, and enter any additional data you want to include.

5. Click "Save". Once your cookie is enabled, any browser that loads the page that's been scanned by a web crawler will also include your cookie
